headline: Straight From the Heart
dek: Candy and roses are fine, but Valentine gifts don’t have to stop there.
excerpt: A luscious array of seductive trinkets for wooing your special Valentine.
content:
The Way To a Man’s Heart is through his feet, with dance lessons from experts like e’va Harding, austin (458-1608); Leo West at Continental Dance Studio, Dallas; or Jeff Hennen, Houston, (524-6584). $15-$25 an hour.

Don’t Whisper Sweet Nothings —wear them. Red silk camisole and panties by Sanchez at Marie Leavell, Dallas. $120.

When You Care Enough to spend $115,000, try this 5.1-carat heart-shaped diamond. Through Neiman-Marcus Precious Jewels, Dallas, Fort Worth, Houston.

Better Red Than Blue. Send a billet-doux off in style with a red satin envelope by Gloria Becker from Non-Such, Inc., Houston. $25.

All You Need Is Love—and heart-shaped Godiva chocolates. Scarbroughs, austin; Frost Bros., San antonio; Neiman-Marcus; Marshall Field, Houston. $12 a pound and up.

An antherium Says “be my Valentine” in no uncertain terms. Cowgirls & Flowers, austin; Marty Swartz, Dallas; The Empty Vase, Houston; allen’s Flowers & Gifts, San antonio. $2-$4.

The Key To Her Heart is an antique heart-shaped locket or pendant from Eve France, Houston. Prices vary.

Get Deep In the Heart Of Texas by spending a weekend in Valentine (population: 224). It must be a great spot for romance; there’s sure nothing else to do there.

She’ll Come Out smelling like a rose—or better—with a personally blended scent from the Scent Shop, Dallas, or the Chemist Shop, Houston. Prices vary.

Photography by Jeremy Green/Kirkley Photography Inc. Lettering by Janice ashford

Kick Up Your Heels in a body-hugging jumpsuit by Omo Norma Kamali from Kasey, Dallas, $76; shoes by Halston from I. Miller, Dalls, or Margo's the Galleria, Houston, $98; and heart-shaped sunglasses from Sportpages catalog, 3373 Towerwood Drive, Dalls 75234, $20.

Janice ashford

If Cupid’s arrow Misses the mark, improve your aim with archery lessons from austin World of archery, austin, or Viking archery, Houston. $5-$7.50 a lesson.

Zing! will go the strings of her heart after a nibble of that legendary aphrodisiac—a stalk of fresh asparagus.

A Hearty Meal means a candlelight dinner for two at a romantic restaurant: The Quorum, austin; Les Saisons, Dallas; Che, Houston; or the anaqua Room, San antonio.

Wear Your Heart under your sleeve with a tattoo from Tattoos by Ron, Dallas; A-1 Tattoo Studio, Fort Worth; or Black Dragon Tattoo Studio, Houston. $30-$50.

Your Opening Gamrit should be a foldout Valentine from Rainbow Works, austin; Under arrest, Dallas; or Facets, Houston. $3.

A Porcelain Mask will keep your true feelings hidden. A Good Shop Is Hard to Find, austin. $20.
